price: 65. Le Jour où Il les appellera, Il leur dira : « Qu’avez-vous répondu aux Messagers ? »
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu mādhā ajabtumu al-mur'salīna
